dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.stat.CustomerBillingStatisticSpec
dataStructure.description:
A detailed description of a collection of statistical data derived from CustomerBills (for example, customer account charge sum over a certain period of time). Statistical data are typically collected during rating and billing processes. A specification may be implemented using a rules engine or a policy to determine collection rules.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBillingStatisticSpec

child.name: name
child.description:
The name of the specification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the specification is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the specification is valid.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: lifecycleStatus
child.description:
The condition of the specification, such as active, inactive, planned.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: lifecycleStatus

child.name: customerBillingStatistic
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustomerBillingStatisticSpecDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillingStatistic
